languages.text: Эвейн Винтерскейл весьма озабочен подобным положением дел на одном из старейших экстракциумов своей династии. Однако он благодарен случаю — и вам — за то, что своевременно смог узнать о назревающей проблеме и так и не прибывшем патрульном корабле. Быть может позже ему удастся все уладить.

traits.locale_text: Эвейн Винтерскейл весьма озабочен подобным положением дел на одном из старейших добытчиков своей династии. Однако он благодарен случаю — и вам — за то, что своевременно смог узнать о назревающей проблеме и так и не прибывшем патрульном корабле. Быть может позже ему удастся все уладить.

languages.text: Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.
languages.original_text: Эвейн Винтерскейл весьма озабочен подобным положением дел на одном из старейших экстракциумов своей династии. Однако он благодарен случаю — и вам — за то, что своевременно смог узнать о назревающей проблеме и так и не прибывшем патрульном корабле. Быть может позже ему удастся все уладить.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the opportunity to learn about the upcoming problem and the missing patrol ship in time. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the opportunity to learn about the upcoming problem and the missing patrol ship in time. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

languages.text: 艾维尼·温特斯凯尔非常担心他的王朝最古老的采矿殖民地目前面临的困境。不过，他很感谢你及时让他了解到殖民地的新情况与那艘失踪的巡逻舰。他认为，他或许能扭转这种局面。
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

traits.locale_text: 艾维尼·温特斯凯尔非常担心他的王朝最古老的采矿殖民地目前面临的困境。不过，他很感谢你及时让他了解到殖民地的新情况与那艘失踪的巡逻舰。他认为，他或许能扭转这种局面。

languages.text: エヴァイン・ウィンタースケールは、王朝で最も古い鉱山コロニーのひとつが抱える苦境に深い関心を寄せている。だが彼は、新たな情勢と行方不明の哨戒艦について絶妙なタイミングで知らせたくれたことに感謝している。彼はこの状況を改善できるかもしれないと考えている。
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

traits.locale_text: エヴァイン・ウィンタースケールは、王朝で最も古い鉱山コロニーのひとつが抱える苦境に深い関心を寄せている。だが彼は、新たな情勢と行方不明の哨戒艦について絶妙なタイミングで知らせたくれたことに感謝している。彼はこの状況を改善できるかもしれないと考えている。

languages.text: Evayne Winterscale está profundamente preocupado por la situación en una de las colonias mineras más antiguas de su dinastía. Sin embargo, está muy agradecido por la oportunidad que se le ha brindado de conocer la situación y la nave patrullera desaparecida. Cree que podrá enderezar la situación.
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterscale está profundamente preocupado por la situación en una de las colonias mineras más antiguas de su dinastía. Sin embargo, está muy agradecido por la oportunidad que se le ha brindado de conocer la situación y la nave patrullera desaparecida. Cree que podrá enderezar la situación.

languages.text: Evayne Winterzunder ist äußerst besorgt ob der Nöte in einer der ältesten Bergbaukolonien seiner Dynastie. Er ist dir jedoch dankbar für die Gelegenheit, mehr über die sich entwickelnde Situation und das verschwundene Patrouillenschiff zu erfahren. Er glaubt, er kann die Lage beheben.
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

traits.locale_text: Evayne Winterzunder ist äußerst besorgt ob der Nöte in einer der ältesten Bergbaukolonien seiner Dynastie. Er ist dir jedoch dankbar für die Gelegenheit, mehr über die sich entwickelnde Situation und das verschwundene Patrouillenschiff zu erfahren. Er glaubt, er kann die Lage beheben.

languages.text: Profondément inquiet du triste sort qui guette l'une des plus anciennes colonies minières de sa dynastie, Evayne Winterscale vous est néanmoins reconnaissant de cette occasion qui lui est donnée de se pencher sur la crise imminente et sur l'affaire du patrouilleur disparu. Mieux encore, il croit pouvoir remédier à la situation.
languages.original_text: Evayne Winterscale is deeply concerned with the predicament in one of the oldest mining colonies of his dynasty. However, he is grateful to you for the timely opportunity to learn about the emerging situation and the missing patrol ship. He thinks he may be able to rectify the situation.

traits.locale_text: Profondément inquiet du triste sort qui guette l'une des plus anciennes colonies minières de sa dynastie, Evayne Winterscale vous est néanmoins reconnaissant de cette occasion qui lui est donnée de se pencher sur la crise imminente et sur l'affaire du patrouilleur disparu. Mieux encore, il croit pouvoir remédier à la situation.
